variables.docs: This resource returns information about player accounts.

apiDataVariables.name: id
apiDataVariables.docs: The unique persistent account GUID.

apiDataVariables.name: age
apiDataVariables.docs: The age of the account in seconds.

apiDataVariables.name: name
apiDataVariables.docs: The unique account name with numerical suffix. It is possible that the name change. Do not rely on the name, use id instead.

apiDataVariables.name: world
apiDataVariables.docs: The id of the home world the account is assigned to. Can be resolved against /v2/worlds.

apiDataVariables.name: guilds
apiDataVariables.docs: A list of guild ids assigned to the given account.

apiDataVariables.name: guild_leader
apiDataVariables.docs: A list of guild ids the account is leader of. overlaps with guilds

apiDataVariables.name: created
apiDataVariables.docs: An ISO-8601 standard timestamp of when the account was created.

apiDataVariables.name: access
apiDataVariables.docs: A list of what content this account has access to. Possible values: None-should probably never happen, PlayForFree-has not yet purchased the game, GuildWars2-has purchased the base game, HeartOfThorns-has purchased Heart of Thorns, PathOfFire-has purchased Path of Fire

apiDataVariables.name: commander
apiDataVariables.docs: True if the player has bought a commander tag.

apiDataVariables.name: fractal_level
apiDataVariables.docs: The account's personal fractal reward level. Requires the additional progression scope.

apiDataVariables.name: daily_ap
apiDataVariables.docs: The daily AP the account has. Requires the additional progression scope.

apiDataVariables.name: monthly_ap
apiDataVariables.docs: The monthly AP the account has. Requires the additional progression scope.

apiDataVariables.name: wvw_rank
apiDataVariables.docs: The account's personal wvw rank. Requires the additional progression scope.

variables.docs: This resource returns an account's progress towards all their achievements.

apiDataVariables.name: achievements
apiDataVariables.docs: The full list of current achievement objects

apiDataVariables.name: id
apiDataVariables.docs: The achievement id.

apiDataVariables.name: bits
apiDataVariables.docs: This attribute contains an array of numbers, giving more specific information on the progress for the achievement. The meaning of each value varies with each achievement.

apiDataVariables.name: current
apiDataVariables.docs: The player's current progress towards the achievement.

apiDataVariables.name: max
apiDataVariables.docs: The amount needed to complete the achievement.

apiDataVariables.name: done
apiDataVariables.docs: Whether or not the achievement is done.

apiDataVariables.name: repeated
apiDataVariables.docs: The number of times the achievement has been completed if the achievement is repeatable.

apiDataVariables.name: unlocked
apiDataVariables.docs: Whether or not the achievement is unlocked. Note that if this property does not exist, the achievement is unlocked as well.

variables.docs: This resource returns the items stored in a player's vault (not including material storage).

apiDataVariables.name: items
apiDataVariables.docs: The endpoint returns an array of objects, each representing an item slot in the vault. If a slot is empty, it will return null. The amount of slots/bank tabs is implied by the length of the array.

apiDataVariables.name: id
apiDataVariables.docs: The item id.

apiDataVariables.name: count
apiDataVariables.docs: The amount of items in the item stack.

apiDataVariables.name: charges
apiDataVariables.docs: The amount of charges remaining on the item.

apiDataVariables.name: skin
apiDataVariables.docs: The skin applied to the item, if it is different from its original. Can be resolved against /v2/skins.

apiDataVariables.name: upgrades
apiDataVariables.docs: An array of item IDs for each rune or signet applied to the item.

apiDataVariables.name: infusions
apiDataVariables.docs: An array of item IDs for each infusion applied to the item.

apiDataVariables.name: binding
apiDataVariables.docs: The current binding of the item. Either Account or Character if present.

apiDataVariables.name: bound_to
apiDataVariables.docs: If binding is Character, this field tells which character it is bound to.

variables.docs: This resource returns the dungeons completed since daily dungeon reset.

apiDataVariables.name: dungeons
apiDataVariables.docs: The endpoint returns an array, each value being the ID of a dungeon path that can be resolved against /v2/dungeons. Note that this ID indicates a path and not the dungeon itself.

variables.docs: This resource returns the unlocked dyes of the account.

apiDataVariables.name: dyes
apiDataVariables.docs: The endpoint returns an array, each value being the ID of a color resolved against /v2/colors.

variables.docs: This resource returns information about finishers that are unlocked for an account.

apiDataVariables.name: finishers
apiDataVariables.docs: This request will return an array of objects with the following properties.

apiDataVariables.name: id
apiDataVariables.docs: The id of the finisher resolvable against /v2/finishers.

apiDataVariables.name: permanent
apiDataVariables.docs: Indicates if the finisher is permanent or temporary.

apiDataVariables.name: quantity
apiDataVariables.docs: If permanent is false, this field will indicate the number of uses the finisher has remaining.

variables.docs: This resource returns the unlocked gliders of the account.

apiDataVariables.name: gliders
apiDataVariables.docs: The endpoint returns an array, each value being the ID resolveable against /v2/gliders.

variables.docs: This resource is a dummy granting access to its children.
This resource returns information about unlocked home instance cats.

apiDataVariables.name: cats
apiDataVariables.docs: This request will return an array of objects with the following properties.

apiDataVariables.name: id
apiDataVariables.docs: The id for the cat that can be resolved against /v2/cats.

apiDataVariables.name: hint
apiDataVariables.docs: A hint to identify what is needed for each cat.

variables.docs: This resource returns information about unlocked home instance nodes.

apiDataVariables.name: nodes
apiDataVariables.docs: This request will return an array of strings. Each string represents the id of a particular node that can be resolved against /v2/nodes.

variables.docs: This resource returns the shared inventory slots in an account.

apiDataVariables.name: items
apiDataVariables.docs: The endpoint returns an array of objects, each representing an item slot in the shared inventory. If a slot is empty, it will return null. The amount of slots is implied by the length of the array.

apiDataVariables.name: id
apiDataVariables.docs: The item id.

apiDataVariables.name: count
apiDataVariables.docs: The amount of items in the item stack.

apiDataVariables.name: charges
apiDataVariables.docs: The amount of charges remaining on the item.

apiDataVariables.name: skin
apiDataVariables.docs: The skin applied to the item, if it is different from its original. Can be resolved against /v2/skins.

apiDataVariables.name: upgrades
apiDataVariables.docs: An array of item IDs for each rune or signet applied to the item.

apiDataVariables.name: infusions
apiDataVariables.docs: An array of item IDs for each infusion applied to the item.

apiDataVariables.name: binding
apiDataVariables.docs: The current binding of the item. If present, the only possible value is Account.

variables.docs: This resource returns information about mail carriers that are unlocked for an account.

apiDataVariables.name: mailcarriers
apiDataVariables.docs: This request will return an array of integer values that can be resolved against /v2/mailcarriers.

variables.docs: This resource returns information about masteries that are unlocked for an account. A tallied up total of the account's mastery points can be found at /v2/account/mastery/points.

apiDataVariables.name: masteries
apiDataVariables.docs: This request will return an array of objects with the following properties.

apiDataVariables.name: id
apiDataVariables.docs: The id of the mastery resolvable against /v2/masteries.

apiDataVariables.name: level
apiDataVariables.docs: Indicates the level at which the mastery is on the account. Is a 0-indexed reference to the /v2/masteries.levels array indicating the maximum level unlocked by the user. If omitted, this mastery hasn't been started.

variables.docs: This resource is a dummy granting access to its children.
This resource returns information about the total amount of masteries that are unlocked for an account. A detailed mastery track completion break down is available at /v2/account/masteries.

apiDataVariables.name: totals
apiDataVariables.docs: This request will return an array of objects with the following properties.

apiDataVariables.name: region
apiDataVariables.docs: The mastery region. Current possible options: Tyria, Maguuma, Desert.

apiDataVariables.name: spent
apiDataVariables.docs: Amount of masteries of this region spent in mastery tracks.

apiDataVariables.name: earned
apiDataVariables.docs: Amount of masteries of this region earned for the account.

apiDataVariables.name: unlocked
apiDataVariables.docs: Array of mastery ids.

variables.docs: This resource returns the materials stored in a player's vault.

apiDataVariables.name: items
apiDataVariables.docs: The endpoint returns an array of objects, each representing a material that can be stored in the vault. Every material will be returned, even if they have a count of 0.

apiDataVariables.name: id
apiDataVariables.docs: The item ID of the material.

apiDataVariables.name: category
apiDataVariables.docs: The material category the item belongs to. Can be resolved against /v2/materials.

apiDataVariables.name: binding
apiDataVariables.docs: The binding of the material. Either Account or omitted.

apiDataVariables.name: count
apiDataVariables.docs: The number of the material that is stored in the account vault.

variables.docs: This resource returns information about miniatures that are unlocked for an account.

apiDataVariables.name: minis
apiDataVariables.docs: This request will return an array of IDs that can be resolved against /v2/minis.

variables.docs: This resource returns information about outfits that are unlocked for an account.

apiDataVariables.name: outfits
apiDataVariables.docs: This request will return an array of IDs that can be resolved against /v2/outfits.

variables.docs: This resource is a dummy granting access to its children.
This resource returns information about pvp heroes that are unlocked for an account.

apiDataVariables.name: heroes
apiDataVariables.docs: This request will return an array of IDs that can be resolved against /v2/pvp/heroes.

variables.docs: This resource returns the raids completed since weekly raid reset.

apiDataVariables.name: raids
apiDataVariables.docs: The endpoints returns an array, each value being the ID of a raid encounter that can be resolved against /v2/raids. Note that this ID indicates an encounter and not the raid wing itself.

variables.docs: This resource returns information about recipes that are unlocked for an account.

apiDataVariables.name: recipes
apiDataVariables.docs: This request will return an array of IDs that can be resolved against /v2/recipes.

variables.docs: This resource returns information about skins that are unlocked for an account.

apiDataVariables.name: skins
apiDataVariables.docs: This request will return an array of IDs that can be resolved against /v2/skins.

variables.docs: This resource returns information about titles that are unlocked for an account.

apiDataVariables.name: titles
apiDataVariables.docs: This request will return an array of IDs that can be resolved against /v2/titles.

variables.docs: This resource returns the currencies of the account.

apiDataVariables.name: currencies
apiDataVariables.docs: The endpoint returns an array of objects, each representing a currency.

apiDataVariables.name: id
apiDataVariables.docs: The currency's ID that can be resolved against /v2/currencies.

apiDataVariables.name: value
apiDataVariables.docs: The amount of this currency.
